comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

1 - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/207347#issue-3134578831

проверьте, что в настройках расширений Opera выдан доступ к "результатам поиска"

2 - > Реклама гугла в поисковой выдаче не блокируется

@akb2 Проверьте в DevTools => Network, какой протокол - h2 или h3. 

Можно попробовать включить эту опцию в расширенных настройках

<details>
<summary>Details</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d160534b-683d-440d-87f0-84b934184566)

</details>

3 - disable "Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion"

4 - > Когда в хроме пытаюсь выбрать "период" в поиске в "инструментах" ничего не происходит, если выключить, появляется всплывающее окошко

Не повторяется с вашими настройками. От фильтров проблема зависит?

5 - 

> Till yesterday everything worked fine but today its not working. I am not able to connect to Adguard public dns using tls on my Android phone and DOH on iphone and also my router is having legacy dns server all the dns does not work. I tried using Adgiard home free option but even that not working either. I am from India and tried all troubleshooting steps but still not able to access internet if I use Adguard DNS. Other DNS like google is working fine without any problem only Adguard DNS is having issues. Normally Adguard DNS use to connect to Singapore servers. Please help me resolve this ASAP.

better contact support@adguard.com Is it working on desktop?
